WELCOME TO BLUEWAVE MADNESS
Special Offer for our Top Tier Partners!
We know selling solar in the winter can be a challenge, so we are offering a MAD promotion for our best, Loyal Blue, partners... Sell the most solar in February 2018, and we will send you the 2018 NCAA Men's Basketball First/Second Rounds Games in Charlotte, NC.
THAT'S RIGHT. SELL SOLAR, GET TICKETS.
Let the Games Begin!
We Can't Wait to See Who Wins it All
-All of Us Here at BlueWave
Terms & Conditions:
Sales must be tracked to individual Sales Rep email addresses in Salesforce, no combined company efforts will qualify for tickets Minimum of 4 loans closed to win Loans sold between 5:00pm on Friday, February 2nd and 11:00pm on Wednesday, February 28th are eligible for this promotion We will announce the winning sales rep on Friday, March 2nd, 2018 via phone call from your BlueWave partner BlueWave will not cover any associated travel expenses to attend these games Tickets will be in the balcony section, enjoy the experience with the real fans!
